en-US.summary: Change Lumiere lights around the world.
examplePhrases: Alexa tell Lumiere Bot to change the lights
Alexa tell Lumiere Bot to change the lights to red and blue
en-US.name: Lumiere Bot
en-US.description: The Lumiere Bot Alexa skill allows you to change Lumiere lights around the world.

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: You will need to have Lumiere running.
publishingInformation.keywords: smart home, smart lights, lumiere, crowdsource
